<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spellmaster's Tenacity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2246) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 48</row>

**Archetype** [Spellmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=32)

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Spellmaster's Resilience](/Feats.aspx?ID=1137)

**Trigger**
You critically fail at a saving throw against a foe's spell, and that spell was cast or created with the tradition of magic you selected with the [Spellmaster's Resilience](/Feats.aspx?ID=1137) feat.

</column>

---

You call upon the power of your spells to protect you from the worst of the magic headed your way. You fail your saving throw instead of critically failing. For 1 minute, increase the circumstance bonus to saving throws from the Spellmaster's Resilience feat to +2, and increase the resistance to damage it grants to 10.
name: Spellmaster's Tenacity
